source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.
source_objects.title: Creativity

items.title: Snapseed - The Definitive Guide

visible_instructors.job_title: Your Guide To the Creative Frontier
visible_instructors.name: Justin
visible_instructors.title: Justin Balog

items.headline: Discover your own creativity and learn how to enhance photographs with Snapseed photo editing tutorials.
objectives_summary: To help you make images that you are excited to share with your friends, family and maybe even the world!
Explore the creative possiblities of Snapseed through real world examples
Have fun!

items.title: The 30 Day Creative Writing Challenge!

visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor / Writer / Teacher for over 20 years
visible_instructors.name: Trace
visible_instructors.title: Trace Crawford

items.headline: Jumpstart Your Fiction, Poetry, Creative Non-Fiction, or Playwrighting with 30 Creativity Boosting Activities
objectives_summary: 30 authentic writing assignments designed to target the skills you need.
This fun and rigorous 30 Day Challenge will energize your creative output!
Complete the challenge in any style or genre you like!

objectives_summary: How to Write a Romance Novel
How to Write Fiction

items.headline: Everything you need to write a Screenplay and complete a Development Package
objectives_summary: How to develop a script and a screenplay from scratch
Create log-lines, synopsis', treatments, visual treatments, step-outlines, character bios and script drafts
Understand script-writing software like Celtx and Causality

items.title: Mixed Media Masterclass
items.headline: A collection of techniques that will boost your Mixed Media knowledge.
objectives_summary: Be able to try out new and different techniques for their mixed media projects
Incorporate new ideas in their mixed media projects

items.title: Writing | Writing a Better Main Character
items.headline: I show you How to Write a Hero and not a Zero
objectives_summary: How to write a better main character
How to convey personality
How to develop a backstory

items.headline: Learn how to write comics from a San Diego comic-con Eisner award-winning writer.
objectives_summary: How to write comic books and graphic novels from start to finish
How to format your script like the pros
How to pace your story like a pro

items.title: From Sex-Obsessed To Creative Genius
items.headline: Stop Procrastinating On Your Projects And Get Back Your Creative Streak
objectives_summary: Once my students finish this course, they will be able to transmute their sexual energy into their creative energy and complete some astounding creative projects.

items.title: Screenwriting: Pitching Your Screenplay or Novel in 60 Secs
items.headline: Learn How to Get Your Screenplay or Novel Read. Pitching is a needed tool in Writing, Storytelling & Screenwriting
objectives_summary: The 8 Steps to a Powerful Pitch
The Cardinal Rule of Pitching
The 10 Essential Elements of Story

items.title: Intro to Graphite Pencil Drawing
items.headline: Drawing and Working with Natural Textures for Beginners
objectives_summary: Recreate a simple landscape photo using graphite pencil.
Use measuring techniques for drawing accuracy.
Create textures and values with graphite pencils.

items.title: Acting Made Easy: Perfecting Your Audition Speech

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional acting training made easy by a Master.
visible_instructors.name: Dave
visible_instructors.title: Dave Lovatt

items.headline: BAFTA nominee Stephen Graham (The Irishman, This is England.)  "Simply put; Dave knows how to make you a better actor"
objectives_summary: How to bring text to Life!
How use a Characters want to drive the speech and bring about natural emotions
THE MAGIC TRICK: Using Images rather than words to lift your speech and make it natural!

items.title: Create Comedy Like a Pro
items.headline: And Improve Your Own Writing With Humor
objectives_summary: Write comedy monologues, sketches, interviews and inject humor into their own writing.

items.headline: A step-by-step approach to writing fiction from an idea to a complete draft. Unlock your creative writing potential.
objectives_summary: The mastery of a unique step-by-step process to write a complete short story.
A good grasp of the short story structure.
A clear understanding of reader expectations for fiction.

items.title: The Creative Thinking Course
items.headline: Learn to harness the power of your creativity
objectives_summary: Access their innate creativity
Develop their creativity
Confidently answer the question, "Are you creative?"

items.title: Learn to express with Poetry and creative writing
items.headline: Tools for self expression
objectives_summary: Write a poem using rhyming words, mind map. How to write a Haiku. How to be confident while recording digital performance.

items.title: MS Word for Writers
items.headline: Word-processing Mastery for Those Who Most Appreciate the Power of Words
objectives_summary: Microsoft Word, especially for writers and authors!

Beginner, intermediate and rock-star hacks to make your writing life simpler
